events.name: mark
events.pointcut_raw: call(* Reader+.mark(..)) && target(r) && (target(PushbackReader) || target(InputStreamReader) || target(FileReader) || target(PipedReader))

raw_lines: RVMLogging.out.println(Level.CRITICAL, "PushbackReader, InputStreamReader, FileReader and PipedReader do not support mark() and reset().");

events.name: reset
events.pointcut_raw: call(* Reader+.reset(..)) && target(r) && (target(PushbackReader) || target(InputStreamReader) || target(FileReader) || target(PipedReader))

raw_lines: RVMLogging.out.println(Level.CRITICAL, "PushbackReader, InputStreamReader, FileReader and PipedReader do not support mark() and reset().");
